name: Lantern Chase
description:
In Lantern Chase, two rival lamplighters compete to see who will be able to light more lanterns - however, once they light a room, they are locked out of it.

Use your wits to outsmart your rival by blocking off their path, but remember, you can  only light the lantern once, so tread carefully - else you lock yourself into a room!

Developed by

  Thanks for playing!
